food.name: Cheeseburger
food.shortDescription: A juicy cheeseburger with a beef patty, cheese, lettuce, and tomato
food.longDescription: A delicious cheeseburger made with a juicy beef patty, melted cheese, fresh lettuce, tomato, and other toppings sandwiched between a toasted bun.

food.name: Veggie Pizza
food.shortDescription: Delicious pizza topped with a variety of vegetables
food.longDescription: A tasty veggie pizza with a crispy crust and topped with a flavorful tomato sauce and loads of sliced vegetables like mushrooms, onions, peppers, olives, etc.
food.label: veggie

food.name: Chicken Wings
food.shortDescription: Spicy and savory chicken wings served with a side of sauce
food.longDescription: Juicy chicken wings fried until crispy and tossed in a spicy buffalo style sauce. Served with a side of blue cheese or ranch dressing.

food.name: Garden Salad
food.shortDescription: Fresh garden salad with a mix of greens, tomatoes, and cucumbers
food.longDescription: A healthy salad made with a variety of mixed greens, slices of vine-ripened tomatoes, cucumbers, carrots, and other fresh vegetables. Topped with your choice of dressing.
food.label: vegan

food.name: Steak
food.shortDescription: Grilled steak cooked to your liking, served with vegetables
food.longDescription: A juicy, flavorful grilled steak cooked to your preferred doneness. Served with a side of fresh, seasonal vegetables.

food.name: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
food.shortDescription: Classic grilled cheese sandwich with melted cheese on toasted bread
food.longDescription: A nostalgic, gooey grilled cheese sandwich made with melted cheese between slices of golden brown toasted bread. A comforting classic!
